text:
Premier League
Arsenal: it gets complicated for Xhaka
Granit Xhaka should no longer wear the captain's armband on the side of Arsenal following his exit to the Gunners fans.
05 Nov 2019, 23:20 by Antoine Chirat



ArsenalAn unfortunate finalist of the last Europa League, the Arsenal Gunners will again try their luck in the second European competition. And find the Champions League through the championship.Icon Sport



Bernd LenoIcon Sport



Nacho MonrealIcon Sport



Shkodran MustafiIcon Sport



Sokratis PapastathopoulosIcon Sport



Ainsley Maitland-NilesIcon Sport



Granite XhakaIcon Sport



Lucas TorreiraIcon Sport



Mesut √ñzilIcon Sport



Pierre-Emerick AubameyangIcon Sport



Alexandre LacazetteIcon Sport



Alex IwobiIcon Sport

Arsenal: the possible eleven of the season




At the meeting between Arsenal and Crystal Palace, Granit Xhaka came out quite angry from the grass, under the hoot of the public, at least verbally attack his own supporters, while wearing the captain's armband. Behavior that obviously has not been able to his coach Unai Emery. Indeed, Sky Sports announces today that he will no longer be the "Captain" of the Gunners during the rest of the season, despite his public apology. The Spaniard did not even call him for the trip to Guimaraes in the Europa League.
